languages.text: "Всегда рад{mf||а} помочь, Идира. Лорд-капитан дурного не посоветует".
"I will always help you, Idira. The Lord Captain will never guide you wrong."
languages.original_text: "Всегда рад{mf||а} помочь, Идира. Лорд-капитан дурного не посоветует".

traits.locale_text: "I will always help you, Idira. The Lord Captain will never guide you wrong."
"I will always help you, Idira. The Lord Captain will never guide you wrong."
"I will always help you, Idira. The Lord Captain will never guide you wrong."
"I will always help you, Idira. The Lord Captain will never guide you wrong."

languages.text: «Siempre le ayudaré, Idira. Su Lord Capitán nunca la guiará por mal camino».
languages.original_text: "I will always help you, Idira. The Lord Captain will never guide you wrong."

traits.locale_text: «Siempre le ayudaré, Idira. Su Lord Capitán nunca la guiará por mal camino».

languages.text: 「いつでも助けよう、イディラ。ロード・キャプテンは必ずお前を正しい道へと導くだろう」
languages.original_text: "I will always help you, Idira. The Lord Captain will never guide you wrong."

traits.locale_text: 「いつでも助けよう、イディラ。ロード・キャプテンは必ずお前を正しい道へと導くだろう」

languages.text: “我始终愿意帮助你，伊迪拉。你的领主舰长绝不会把你引入歧途。”
languages.original_text: "I will always help you, Idira. The Lord Captain will never guide you wrong."

traits.locale_text: “我始终愿意帮助你，伊迪拉。你的领主舰长绝不会把你引入歧途。”

languages.text: « Je serai toujours là pour vous aider, Idira. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} vous guidera toujours sur le bon chemin. »
languages.original_text: "I will always help you, Idira. The Lord Captain will never guide you wrong."

traits.locale_text: « Je serai toujours là pour vous aider, Idira. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} vous guidera toujours sur le bon chemin. »

languages.text: "Ich werde Euch immer helfen, Idira. Der Lord Captain wird Euch niemals falsch führen."
languages.original_text: "I will always help you, Idira. The Lord Captain will never guide you wrong."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde Euch immer helfen, Idira. Der Lord Captain wird Euch niemals falsch führen."

languages.text: "Senden asla yardımımı esirgemem İdira. Lord Kaptan, seni asla yanlış yönlendirmez."
languages.original_text: "I will always help you, Idira. The Lord Captain will never guide you wrong."

traits.locale_text: "Senden asla yardımımı esirgemem İdira. Lord Kaptan, seni asla yanlış yönlendirmez."
